verses.name: Malachi 3:12
verses.text: And all nations shall call you blessed: for ye shall be a delightsome land, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Malachi 3:13
verses.text: Your words have been stout against me, saith the Lord. Yet ye say, What have we spoken so much against thee?

verses.name: Malachi 3:14
verses.text: Ye have said, It is vain to serve God: and what profit is it that we have kept his ordinance, and that we have walked mournfully before the Lord of hosts?

verses.name: Malachi 3:15
verses.text: And now we call the proud happy; yea, they that work wickedness are set up; yea, they that tempt God are even delivered.
